title: The Difference Between Material and Spiritual Activity | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.summary: The speaker uses the example of the need for breaks and vacations in material work to illustrate the difference with spiritual activity.

segments.key_quote: Even 24 hours in a day is not enough. I want more time. I want to do more.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that devotional service to Krishna is never tiring because it is transcendental and provides constant satisfaction.
